title: everything i wanted
author: Billie Eilish
lyrics:
[00:17.33] I had a dream
[00:20.42] I got everything I wanted
[00:25.17] Not what you'd think
[00:28.89] And if I'm being honest
[00:30.80] It might've been a nightmare
[00:34.81] To anyone who might care
[00:38.94] 
[00:41.22] Thought I could fly (fly)
[00:44.72] So I stepped off the Golden, mm
[00:49.20] Nobody cried (cried, cried, cried, cried)
[00:52.89] Nobody even noticed
[00:54.86] I saw them standing right there
[00:59.06] Kinda thought they might care (might care, might care)
[01:05.25] I had a dream
[01:08.51] I got everything I wanted
[01:11.87] But when I wake up, I see
[01:16.01] You with me
[01:19.22] And you say
[01:20.74] "As long as I'm here, no one can hurt you
[01:28.54] Don't wanna lie here, but you can learn to
[01:36.61] If I could change the way that you see yourself
[01:44.25] You wouldn't wonder why you hear
[01:48.58] 'They don't deserve you'"
[01:53.23] I tried to scream
[01:56.66] But my head was underwater
[02:01.25] They called me weak
[02:04.39] Like I'm not just somebody's daughter
[02:06.72] It could've been a nightmare
[02:10.66] But it felt like they were right there
[02:15.57] And it feels like yesterday was a year ago
[02:19.75] But I don't wanna let anybody know
[02:23.66] 'Cause everybody wants something from me now
[02:27.70] And I don't wanna let 'em down
[02:33.47] I had a dream
[02:36.43] I got everything I wanted
[02:39.60] But when I wake up, I see
[02:43.97] You with me
[02:47.25] And you say
[02:48.82] "As long as I'm here, no one can hurt you
[02:56.40] Don't wanna lie here, but you can learn to
[03:04.65] If I could change the way that you see yourself
[03:12.11] You wouldn't wonder why you hear
[03:16.57] 'They don't deserve you'"
[03:19.91] If I knew it all then, would I do it again?
[03:24.26] Would I do it again?
[03:28.18] If they knew what they said would go straight to my head
[03:32.49] What would they say instead?
[03:36.17] If I knew it all then, would I do it again?
[03:40.30] Would I do it again?
[03:44.03] If they knew what they said would go straight to my head
[03:48.31] What would they say instead?
[03:50.24]
